start_date.title: Start Date
start_date.description: UTC date and time in the format 2017-01-25. Any data before this date will not be replicated.

window_in_days.title: Query Window (in days)
window_in_days.description: The amount of days for each data-chunk beginning from Start Date. Bigger the value - faster the fetch. (0.1 - as for couple of hours, 1 - as for a Day; 364 - as for a Year).

tenant_endpoint.title: Tenant Endpoint Location
tenant_endpoint.description: Please choose the right endpoint where your Tenant is located. More info by this Link

data_query.title: Data Query Type
data_query.description: Choose between `Live`, or `Unlimited` - the optimized, replicated database at 12 hours freshness for high volume extraction Link

client_id.title: Client ID
client_id.description: The Client ID of your Zuora developer application.

client_secret.title: Client Secret
client_secret.description: The Client Secret of your Zuora developer application.
